chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: eill_vars
q: eill_vars -> eill_vars
rx: pos n -> eill_vars
ry: pos n -> eill_vars
H_rx: forall p q : pos n, rx p = rx q -> p = q
P: (eill_vars * list (mm_instr (pos n)))%type
k: eill_vars
Hk: out_code k P
H_s_q: forall (i : eill_vars) (v : Vector.t eill_vars n), s (q i) v <-> P // (i, v) ->> (k, vec_zero)

Goal:
forall (p : pos n) (v : Vector.t eill_vars n), s (rx p) v <-> v = vec_one p

Premises:

mm_compute_DEC_0 : forall (n : eill_vars) (P : eill_vars * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : eill_vars) (x : pos n) (k : eill_vars) (v : vec eill_vars n) (st : eill_vars * vec eill_vars n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> vec_pos v x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st
mm_nullify_compute : forall (n : eill_vars) (zero : pos n) (i : eill_vars) (lr : list (pos n)) (v w : vec eill_vars n), vec_pos v zero = 0 -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> p <> zero) -> (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> vec_pos w p = 0) -> (forall p : pos n, ~ In p lr -> vec_pos w p = vec_pos v p) -> (i, mm_nullify zero i lr) // (i, v) -> > (length (mm_nullify zero i lr) + i, w)
mm_steps_DEC_0_inv : forall (n k : eill_vars) (P : eill_vars * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : eill_vars) (x : pos n) (p : eill_vars) (v : vec eill_vars n) (st : eill_vars * vec eill_vars n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> vec_pos v x = 0 -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : eill_vars, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) -[k'] -> st
mm_progress_DEC_0 : forall (n : eill_vars) (P : eill_vars * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : eill_vars) (x : pos n) (k : eill_vars) (v : vec eill_vars n) (st : eill_vars * vec eill_vars n), (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P -> vec_pos v x = 0 -> P // (k, v) -> > st -> sss_progress (mm_sss (n:=n)) P (i, v) st
mm_steps_DEC_1_inv : forall (n k : eill_vars) (P : eill_vars * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : eill_vars) (x : pos n) (p : eill_vars) (v : vec eill_vars n) (u : eill_vars) (st : eill_vars * vec eill_vars n), (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P -> k <> 0 -> vec_pos v x = S u -> P // (i, v) -[k] -> st -> exists k' : eill_vars, k' < k /\ P // (1 + i, vec_change v x u) -[k'] -> st
ill_tps_vec_map_list_mono : forall (n : eill_vars) (s : eill_vars -> vec eill_vars n -> Prop) (rx : pos n -> eill_vars), (forall p : pos n, s (rx p) (vec_one p)) -> forall v : vec eill_vars n, ill_tps_list s (map £ (vec_map_list v rx)) v

```coq
Lemma ill_tps_vec_map_list_monotone :
  forall (n : eill_vars) (s : eill_vars -> vec eill_vars n -> Prop) (rx : pos n -> eill_vars),
    (forall p : pos n, s (rx p) (vec_one p)) ->
    forall v w : vec eill_vars n, vec_leq v w -> ill_tps_list s (map £ (vec_map_list v rx)) v -> ill_tps_list s (map £ (vec_map_list w rx)) w.
Proof.
  intros n s rx Hrx v w Hleq Hv.
  apply ill_tps_vec_map_list with (1 := Hrx) (2 := Hleq).
Qed.

Lemma rx_pos_leq : forall (n : eill_vars) (p q : pos n), rx p = rx q -> p <= q.
Proof.
  intros n p q Hrx.
  apply H_rx in Hrx.
  unfold rx in Hrx.
  rewrite Hrx.
  reflexivity.
Qed.

Lemma mm_compute_DEC_0_monotone :
  forall (n : eill_vars) (P : eill_vars * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : eill_vars) (x : pos n) (k : eill_vars) (v w : vec eill_vars n) (st : eill_vars * vec eill_vars n),
    (i, DECₐ x k :: nil) <sc P ->
    vec_leq v w ->
    P // (k, v) ->> st -> P // (i, v) ->> st ->
    P // (k, w) ->> st.
Proof.
  intros n P i x k v w st Hsc Hleq Hv Hew Hst1 Hst2.
  apply mm_compute_DEC_0 with (1 := Hsc) (2 := Hleq) (3 := Hv) (4 := Hew).
  apply rx_pos_leq.
Qed.

Lemma mm_nullify_compute_monotone :
  forall (n : eill_vars) (zero : pos n) (i : eill_vars) (lr : list (pos n)) (v w : vec eill_vars n),
    vec_leq v w ->
    (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> p <> zero) ->
    (forall p : pos n, In p lr -> vec_pos w p = 0) ->
    (forall p : pos n, ~ In p lr -> vec_pos w p = vec_pos v p) ->
    (i, mm_nullify zero i lr) // (i, v) ->> (length (mm_nullify zero i lr) + i, w).
Proof.
  intros n zero i lr v w Hleq Hzero Hin Hlw Hnw Hst.
  apply mm_nullify_compute with (1 := Hleq) (2 := Hzero) (3 := Hin) (4 := Hlw) (5 := Hnw).
  reflexivity.
Qed.

Lemma mm_steps_DEC_0_inv_monotone :
  forall (n k : eill_vars) (P : eill_vars * list (mm_instr (pos n))) (i : eill_vars) (x : pos n) (p : eill_vars) (v w : vec eill_vars n) (st : eill_vars * vec eill_vars n),
    (i, DECₐ x p :: nil) <sc P ->
    k <> 0 ->
    vec_leq v w ->
    P // (k, v) ->> st -> exists k' : eill_vars, k' < k /\ P // (p, v) ->> st ->
    exists k' : eill_vars, k' < k /\ P // (p, w) ->> st.
Proof.
  intros n k P i x p v w st Hsc Hk Hleq Hv Hew Hst Hk'.
  destruct Hk' as [k' [Hlt Hst']].
  exists k'; split.
  apply le_lt_trans with k; auto.
  apply mm_steps_DEC_0_inv with (1 := Hsc) (2 := Hk) (3 := Hleq) (4 := Hv) (5 := Hew) (6 := Hst).
Qed.
